name: Itemwise Causewise Machining Rejection Register
query:
Select mr.finished_item AS 'Finished Item Code',
mr.finished_item_name AS 'Finished Item Name',
mr.operation_code AS 'Operation Code',
mr.operation_name AS 'Operation Name',
mr.rejection_type AS 'Rejection Type',
mr.rejection_reason AS 'Rejection Reason',
mr.rejection_qty AS 'Rejection Quantity'

FROM `tabMachining` m 
LEFT JOIN `tabMachining Rejection Reasons Details` mr ON m.name = mr.parent
Where mr.finished_item = %(finished_item)s AND mr.rejection_type = %(rejection_type)s AND mr.rejection_reason = %(rejection_reason)s 
AND m.company = %(company)s AND m.date BETWEEN %(from_date)s ANd %(to_date)s
